novice.title: Loot Boxes - Variables Intro

novice.title: Virtual Pet - Integer Feeding
novice.description: Learn to set numerical variables to feed a virtual pet.

novice.title: Loot Boxes - Multiple Variables
novice.description: Set multiple variables to win multiple prizes!

novice.title: Title Screen - Sun Position
novice.description: Learn about screen space by changing the position of the sun!

novice.title: Title Screen - Customize It
novice.description: Play around and create your very own title screen!

novice.description: Modify a stage to help your character reach their goal!

novice.description: Modify a more complex stage to help your character reach their goal!

novice.title: Stage Maker - Customize It
novice.description: Create your own stage using multidimensional arrays!

intermediate.description: Pit your programmable bot against a series of bots with increasing difficulty

intermediate.title: Block Bots - Player vs Player
intermediate.description: Pit your programmable bot against another player
